titleStmt.title: The Great work of redemption deliver'd in five sermons at St. Paul's, and at the Spittle, Aprill, 1641 ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Playford and are to be sold at his Shop in the Temple, neer the Church door,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.

On the passion of Our Saviour / by Dr. Soames, Vicar of Staynes.- -On Our Saviours resurrection / by Dr. Morton, bp. of Durham.--An appeal to Gods mercy / by Dr. Potter, bp. of Carlile.--The expectation of a Christian / By Dr. Westfield, bp. of Bristol.--The imperfection of a Christian in this life / by W. Price.

place.placeName: his Shop in the Temple, neer the Church door
